description:
Shaher Astronomical Headquarters is an observatory located in the center of Eustitia, constructions made of stone congregates around it.
The Shaher Astronomical Observatory`s Research Institute has ensured a vast assortment of activities, such as discovering new stars, researching anything related to astronomy, and manufacturing telescopes. The personnel at Shaher`s headquarters in Eustitia manage books about every known star, collected from all over the world. Having been established as the annex of the astronomical observatories, the headquarters safeguards a gigantic library. Every one of its books is about stars and the myths related to them.
Source: Violet Evergarden Wiki
name: Shaher Tenmon Honbu
